Spring.Container.Common Classes

Classes
 NameDescription
ImplementsAttribute

Applies this attribute to tell the IoC container which service is implemented by the target component. In addition, a service name can be specified.

InjectAttribute

Applies the InjectAttribute to injectable instance members of a class. e.g. constructors, methods, properties and even fields. Also works on parameters of a method.

LifetimeAttributeBase

Represents an abstract lifetime attribute class base.

PooledAttribute

Represents that the target component can be pooled.

SingletonAttribute

Applies this attribute when a component shares the single instance.

SingletonAttributeBase

Represents type SingletonAttributeBase.

SingletonPerThreadAttribute

Applies this attribute when a component shares the single instance per thread.

TransientAttribute

Represents that a new instance of the component will be created when requested.
